name: ANY LAST WORDS?
description:
Welcome aboard the CC Major II, the largest interplanetary support satellite in the solar system. As far as last resorts go, you've lucked out!

As a ZERO-SUM ENGINEER,  your mission is simple. There's an old data hub at the heart of the ship. Meet it, greet it, then turn it off. "Why me?" you may find yourself asking. "Why have I been given the job of ending the life of another sentient being? Does this make me a bad person?" If you want to keep your job, then understand that these questions are all strictly rhetorical.

Over the course of your duty, you can expect to find:

- A unique, console-driven experience that responds to your choices

- Original music by T-LARC

- Unlockable achievements with multiple endings

- Space spam

- Thoughtful mediations on life, death and baked goods
